Articles.Content: Module Manager can't load Mir\_Core\_Module ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif). Any idea why guys?

> 
> Module Manager can't load Mir\_Core\_Module ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif). Any idea why guys?

Does it freeze on loading screen? Im at my pc now so I can have a look.

That's because you need to reapply the compatability patch and, if not using RO, delete the appropriate folder from GameData. I run into that a lot after each update.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, and one other thing I noticed. You've got the radiators and solar arrays reversed. S1/P1 should be radiators, while S4/P4 and S6/P6 should be solar arrays.

First sorry for bad English ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Yes Mike. It freeze on loading screen. I use RO, RSS and yours freshest released parts packages.

I made a couple of attempts, and I think it has something to do with the scale definitions in RO\_ISS.cfg file. The problem is with MIR parts.
Try redownload the new pack on page one. All in one download now to make it easy

[https://github.com/MrMikeNZ](https://github.com/MrMikeNZ)

Files hosted here also
Um... Where's the JEM ELM-PM?

> 
> Um... Where's the JEM ELM-PM?

It dissapeared? Is that the module that comes out of the jem? The animated one? I made it seperate so you attach it using the jap arm and to stop the frame rate killing.

I have an issue: downloaded from your github, trying to load your .craft files and this occurs: 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/kd6wn)

Also, installed your "Extra glide, Less drag, More lift patch" and "Engine fix patch" and this occurred: craft can't be loaded because km.ssme.STS, STSOMSEngineLeft, STSOMSEngineRight are missing

how to fix?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-17T13:23:44Z" title="08/17/2015 01:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 17, 2015</time> by trooperMNG**

> 
> I have an issue: downloaded from your github, trying to load your .craft files and this occurs: 
> [http://imgur.com/a/kd6wn](http://imgur.com/a/kd6wn)
> 
> Also, installed your "Extra glide, Less drag, More lift patch" and "Engine fix patch" and this occurred: craft can't be loaded because km.ssme.STS, STSOMSEngineLeft, STSOMSEngineRight are missing
> 
> how to fix?

sorry, engine fix patch is now incompatible (OLD) and I have removed it.

you will have to re-install those engine configs and you can re apply the Extra glide, Less drag, More lift patch

also did you install the soviet pack mod?

I have loaded up on my save, checking now...

made one fix to apas port on soviet pack. updated on github

all ships load up 100%

just make sure you have the soviet pack as well as the ISS pack if you want the soviet craft files to load

also, there is a different space shuttle mod made for realism overhaul if you are using realism overhaul

Now it's working, but only after putting all of the soviet things into a folder named SovietPack (like the old bobcat folder). The folder you provide (SovietPack-master) doesn't allow me to see parts in VAB.

Proton first stage engines gimbal is uncontrollable, both manually and with mechjeb. When you start the gravity turn, the whole thing begins rotating out of control. Tomorrow I'll test Soyuz. However, your work is incredible, this was my favourite KSP mod pack, and I was really sad when 1.0+ came and I saw that Bobcat wasn't actually updating it. Great work both with ISS/Mir and Shuttle, I'm asking myself how can you update so fast! Relax man! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Will properly orfanise things tonight. Got mixed up finding the latest work from my diffferent installs and grouping them into the different uploads. Always last minute.
So I downloaded the newest release of the ISS pack from the front page and now I'm apparently missing the ISS FGB (Zarya) as well as some of the Mir parts (Zvezda). Any idea what i should do?

Soyuz tested. Apparently no gimbal on first stage, uncontrollable and vertical ascent. Escape tower not working (engine status off). Parachute has a strange behaviour, and the hatch for entering soyuz descent module is pretty difficult to reach. Everything else seem ok.

I might have been doing it wrong on github, so now I am making it simple and easy

Just some quick textures I made for the original Dreamchaser 0.90 pack back in April 2015. It somewhat resembles the real Dreamchaser + Atlas V (with Nasa, Atlas, ULA and SNC markings).
